entry.title: bleeding heart
entry.summary:
Author: mrhuskay

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,972Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: He walked and walked and walked. Like a baby taking their first steps towards the open arms of their father. Buck got glimpses of that proud face, of those comforting hugs.He wasn’t that little kid whose parents didn’t even look at him when he started walking anymore. Instead, he was that young adult that Bobby was looking with pride all over his face when he finished his probationary year.He wasn’t that teenager that only got noticed by his parents when he fell down a tree or crashed his bike. He was the reckless adult that Bobby reprimanded for taking dangerous risks, just because he loved him, and cared about him, and didn’t want to see him hurt.- or-Buck is not coping very well. Or at all.

entry.title: we could share a lifeline
entry.summary:
Author: eulogizebuck

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,659Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 8

Summary: 'If you find yourself out, if there is a right timechances are I'll be here, we could share a lifeline'Buck and Eddie's first day at work after Eddie comes home is everything but ordinary.“I think I’m in love with you.” The words just slip out of Buck’s mouth. He seems surprised himself, like he didn’t expect himself to say that.“I know,” Eddie says.Buck does a double-take. He knew?

entry.title: Married At First Sight LA
entry.summary:
Author: tinypeckers

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,755Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 41

Summary: Is love a scientific anomaly? This is what the experts of Married of First Sight LA are trying to test in this new reality TV show where strangers are matched to each other based on their personalities, likes and dislikes.Will these hopeful newlyweds find true love amongst the drama? Or will this experiment prove too much for some of our couples? Find out this season on Married At First Sight LA!  Tags will be updated alongside the story.

He’s studying to become a child psychologist, whilst trying to find true love in between meaningless hookups.Eddie Diaz moves to LA to be with his girlfriend and son after his first tour and getting shot. They end up breaking up leaving them to figure out how to co-parent together and Eddie to figure out his next career.

entry.title: Built in the wreckage
entry.summary:
Author: innocencediedscreaming

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,223Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 19

Summary: “E-Eddie,” Buck’s voice was quiet and wrecked. “He’s gone.”Eddie’s heart dropped like a stone.“Who, Buck?” It was barely a whisper, the words catching in his throat. Deep down he already knew. He could feel it in his bones.“Cap, he-” Buck sobbed. “Fuck, Eddie. Cap. He’s dead.”

entry.title: Chase the Night Away
entry.summary:
Author: ravensfirefly

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,677Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 9

Summary: It was no surprise that he'd stop dreaming about leaving his son once he knew Christopher would be in good hands should something ever happen. It was a small mercy, and if it meant he had to relive being shot some nights, then so be it. It couldn't possibly get worse. Until it did. Until he knew what it was like to stare up and see Buck hanging suspended in midair, motionless save for the swaying of the cable that acted as a lifeline, the only thing that had kept him from falling to the ground when lightning struck. Or, Eddie has always been plagued by nightmares.

entry.title: This Place Could Be Beautiful, Right? You Could Make This Place Beautiful.
entry.summary:
Author: Mariereads167

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 132,599Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 117

Summary: Life is no longer the same for Eddie and Buck. The last seven years of comfort and familiarity are threatened to be washed away and in its place now is a physical seperation by hundred of miles.But alas, they trudge on.Buck learns how to love himself amidst loneliness and how to let that be enough.Eddie grapples with his shifting identity and what it means to be unsure of yourself in a world that seems to be so unforgiving.Both men find love in one another and in their diverging lives. And even in the weeks and months to come, as they make their way back to one another, they realize that loving themselves is the only foundation their relationship can rest on.OR: Buck remains in LA with his lingering feelings in this new chapter of his life without Eddie by his side.Eddie is in Texas working on his relationship with Christopher.When you are a parent, you are trying to sell the world to your children.‘Any decent realtor, walking you through a shithole, chirps on about good bones.'And both Buck and Eddie realize that to love the world, they must first love who they are in it.

entry.title: [PODFIC] The Mortifying Ordeal Of Being Known by Polish_Amber
entry.summary:
Author: RockStar03

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 154Chapters: 3/7Kudos: 12

Summary: The thing was, the 118 was full of gossips.Eddie had been at the station less than a week before Hen and Chim wrangled details about his “hot young thing” from him (“Buck is only 4 years younger than me, he is not a ‘hot young thing’!” Eddie complained.)And Bobby was open about his worries for his son’s lack of direction and the secrets he appears to be keeping (“I just wish I could help Evan find the thing that gives him purpose,” Bobby lamented.)It just made it all the more ridiculous (and horrifying) when Eddie realizes he’s been dating his Captain’s son this whole time (“Defiling his baby,” Chimney cackled, because he clearly wanted Eddie murdered.)--Or, the AU where miscommunication abounds as Eddie seeks advice about his new relationship, Bobby despairs over his adopted son's career prospects and his refusal to talk about it, and Evan Buckley-Nash juggles training at the fire academy, building a family with his new boyfriend, and trying to work out how to tell his overprotective dad that he's already chosen the life he wants, actually.It takes a goddamn tsunami, of all things, to get the story straight.

entry.title: if anyone falls in love (it’ll be one of us)
entry.summary:
Author: insidethevoid

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,369Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 95

Summary: Eddie isn’t sure when he fell in love with Buck, but it must have been a long time ago. Once he’d started working on himself, everything fell so easily into place. He still has a long way to go when it comes to allowing himself grace and forgiveness and, well, to drink the juice. But when Eddie had begun digging up all those things he’d repressed, there was one that surprised him and another that just made sense. Eddie and Buck get trapped together on a call. They’ve got nothing but time and so much to talk about.

entry.title: Nothing Left To Do
entry.summary:
Author: hyperfixatedhoney

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,267Chapters: 6/14Kudos: 20

Summary: “Buck,” Eddie is standing next to Buck but shifts to look Buck in the eye. There’s a look in Eddie’s eyes that Buck refuses to let himself acknowledge. It’s soft, welcoming, it makes Buck believe whatever Eddie says, “I’m sure it’ll be fine. We probably just missed out on a hitter, there was that one guy out of Austin Bobby was trying to get”“Yeah, you’re right,” Buck agreed, Eddie was right, it’ll be okay, “Well, nothing left to do but win huh?”Eddie smiles, gentle and sincere, “Nothing left to do but win”.OR: Buddie Baseball AU (no actual knowledge of baseball required)Updated on Wednesdays

entry.title: Long and Lost
entry.summary:
Author: WhaleFallDown

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,217Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 22

Summary: “Karen?” he asks, gripping the phone tight to his ear, “What happened? What’s wrong?”It’s loud, wherever she is. He can hear shouting, the barking of orders. He can hear her trying to start a sentence and failing.Shit.The dread hits him all at once.“Who?” the word leaves his throat harsh, a burning scrape. Like a command.He’s in his kitchen, in El Paso, the contents of his cabinets are scattered around him, and he knows with a sickening kind of certainty that somebody he loves is dead.“I’m sorry,” Karen finally says, thickly, “Eddie, it’s Bobby. He’s gone.” or, Bobby dies and Eddie and Chris finally come home.

entry.title: Head over Heels
entry.summary:
Author: Matto

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,689Chapters: 2/6Kudos: 108

Summary: Eddie's gravelly morning voice does things to Buck - it's one of Buck's favourites. He squeezes his eyes closed and tries to keep his heart rate under control. Eddie can probably feel his pulse jump from where his arm is laying on his chest.“H- Uh… Hey.”Smooth Buckley. He definitely didn’t notice your shameless thirsting over literally everything-Bucks thoughts immediately stall when he feel’s Eddie huff a laugh into his skin and he drags his hand from his shoulder down to his sternum. His palm lies flat against his chest, exactly where you press when you do CPR, exactly where Eddie has pressed before, restarting his heart after 3 minutes and 17 seconds-Eddies fingers start playing with his chest hair. OR5 times people realise that Eddie has no chill when he is in a relationship he actually cares about, and the one time he is overly chill, much to everyone's surprise

entry.title: i can't keep my panties from dropping
entry.summary:
Author: buckdiass

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,384Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 91

Summary: There’s something to be said about the selfishness on his part. He shouldn’t be taking advantage of the situation, of the position he’s in. He shouldn’t crave it, but he does. Because Evan Buckley is in love with Eddie Diaz. He is. Maddie knew. Tommy knew. And Buck is now going to be the fool that sleeps with the love of his life so that they can sweat off the effects of an aerosolized drug. What is his life really? 9-1-1 Contagion but with sex pollen.

entry.title: Dial Drunk

Author: dinosaurs_and_corn

Summary: Tommy breaks up with Buck and he is officially over the baking stage, so he is now back on his Buck 1.0 path, except every time he gets drunk he ends up at Eddie’s front door.Eddie is just trying to find ways to feel normal about Christopher being in Texas.
